page.title: 12A Kid from Splott
page.content: Morning time and I feel like going back to sleep.I'm just about to drop off to sleep again when my mum bursts in;"Do you know it is 10a.m.Hurry up and get out into the sunshine!"she nags."yes,mum"I groan.I get dressed and crawl down to breakfast.It's the usual boring cornflakes again.I eat my breakfast and sit down and watch television.All of a sudden mum switches it off and shouts;"No time for that lad,I've got a job to go to.Now hurry up."Suddenly the bell rings!It's my friend Michael Cook."I'm going out to play now mum!"I cry."Too right you are my lad,now hoppit!"We played all afternoon playing football,he beat me again 6 goals to nil.I go home and have eggs,beans and chips.Mum's in love again watching 'Sons and Daughters'.I go back out to the Park and play until bedtime.
